name: MDB Internal API: HTTP 2xx replies by DC
description: MDB Internal API: HTTP 2xx response rate

elements.title: myt
elements.expression: sum({cluster="mdb_internal_api", host="api-dbaas*", sensor="int_api_dbaas_internal_api_count_2xx_dmmm_rate", node="replica", dc="myt"}) by sensor

elements.expression: sum({cluster="mdb_internal_api", host="api-dbaas*", sensor="int_api_dbaas_internal_api_count_2xx_dmmm_rate", node="replica", dc="sas"}) by sensor
